amendment.description: To prevent the creation of duplicative and overlapping Federal programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 521 proposed by Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 521, under the order of 6/23/2011, not having achieved 67 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 63 - 34. Record Vote Number: 102.
